pkgmetadata.longdescription: Interactive Data Visualization with D3.js // The dashboard package allows users to create web pages which display interactive data visualizations working in a standard modern browser. It displays them locally using the Rook server. Nor knowledge about web technologies nor Internet connection are required. D3.js is a JavaScript library for manipulating documents based on data. D3 helps the dashboard package bring data to life using HTML, SVG and CSS.
